lead_paragraph: The Scottish Chamber Orchestra, with an unusual mix of instruments, finds a rare depth in a Beethoven work on Sunday afternoon at the 92nd Street Y.
snippet: The Scottish Chamber Orchestra, with an unusual mix of instruments, finds a rare depth in a Beethoven work on Sunday afternoon at the 92nd Street Y.

headline.main: Through a Judicious Use of Valvelessness, Hoping to Achieve Vividness
headline.seo: Scottish Chamber Orchestra at 92nd Street Y - Review
headline.print_headline: Through a Judicious Use of Valvelessness, Hoping to Achieve Vividness
